participant_1.background:
I'm proud of my daughter and mom!
I went for a walk today after work, even though I was tired
i got married 10 years later.
i have two dogs , one pitbull and old english bulldog.
I like to eat the skin of the apple, but my family is not fond of it.

participant_2.background:
I'm a family man from the midwest with a passion for theatre.
my mom is a cancer survivor.
My family and I work hard on our farm.
I love listening to the Beatles while I work on my dog's training.
i enjoy electronic music.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Pretty good, my mom is a cancer survivor and it's been a tough journey but she's doing great!
That's great to hear! My mom is also a cancer survivor so I know how tough it can be.
I'm glad to hear that! What kind of cancer did your mom have?
She had breast cancer. How about your mom?
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. How long has she been in remission?
She's been in remission for about 5 years now.
That's great news! How did you find out about your mom's cancer?
I found a lump in her breast.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that. How did you find out about your mom's cancer?
I found a lump in her breast.
Did you know that October is breast cancer awareness month?
It's a great time to raise awareness for breast cancer and to encourage people to get screened.
That's a great idea! I'm going to start telling my friends and family about it.
That's great! I'm sure they'll appreciate it.
